attributes.action: Ask the EU to recognise the independence of Somaliland from war-torn Mogadishu
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The territory known as The Republic of Somaliland, formerly the protectorate of British Somaliland, is the only stable region within the otherwise lawless Somalia (Italian Somaliland). Recognise the right to self-determination of the people of this country and the declaration of independence proclaimed on the 18th of May 1991.

A previous petition on this site for recognition of the country obtained the response "we can't do that because the EU says so". Therefore it is time we told the EU otherwise.
Previous response: http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11305.asp
